languages.text: "Интересно. Я знал, что у него были секреты даже от меня, товарища и духовника. Впрочем, знакомство с вами не единственный такой секрет. Мне также неизвестно, кто таков или такова Фиделио, которого Денз назначил наследником".

"Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."
languages.original_text: "Интересно. Я знал, что у него были секреты даже от меня, товарища и духовника. Впрочем, знакомство с вами не единственный такой секрет. Мне также неизвестно, кто таков или такова Фиделио, которого Денз назначил наследником".

traits.locale_text: "Interesting. I knew he had his secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

"Interesting. I knew he had his secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

"Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

"Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

"Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

languages.text: “真有趣，我是他的朋友，也是他的告解者，但他似乎依然对我隐藏着秘密。不过，这也并不是他唯一的秘密。丹兹指定菲迪奥为他的继承人，但我依然不知道这个菲迪奥究竟是什么人。”
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: “真有趣，我是他的朋友，也是他的告解者，但他似乎依然对我隐藏着秘密。不过，这也并不是他唯一的秘密。丹兹指定菲迪奥为他的继承人，但我依然不知道这个菲迪奥究竟是什么人。”

languages.text: «Interesante. Sabía que tenía secretos incluso para mí, su amigo y confesor, pero este no es el primero que descubro. Aún no sé quién es Fidelio, la persona a la que Denz lega su fortuna».
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: «Interesante. Sabía que tenía secretos incluso para mí, su amigo y confesor, pero este no es el primero que descubro. Aún no sé quién es Fidelio, la persona a la que Denz lega su fortuna».

languages.text: 「なるほど。彼の友人であり聴罪師である私にさえ隠し事をしていたのは知っていましたが、秘密はほかにもあるようです。デンツが相続人に指定したフィデリオという人物の正体も知らないのでね」
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: 「なるほど。彼の友人であり聴罪師である私にさえ隠し事をしていたのは知っていましたが、秘密はほかにもあるようです。デンツが相続人に指定したフィデリオという人物の正体も知らないのでね」

languages.text: "Interessant. Ich wusste, dass er Geheimnisse vor mir hatte, seinem Freund und Beichtvater. Das Treffen mit Euch ist nicht das einzige Geheimnis, das ich entdeckt habe. Ich weiß nach wie vor nicht, wer Fidelio ist, die Person, der Denz alles vererbt hat."
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: "Interessant. Ich wusste, dass er Geheimnisse vor mir hatte, seinem Freund und Beichtvater. Das Treffen mit Euch ist nicht das einzige Geheimnis, das ich entdeckt habe. Ich weiß nach wie vor nicht, wer Fidelio ist, die Person, der Denz alles vererbt hat."

languages.text: « Intéressant. Je savais qu'il cachait des choses, même à moi, son ami et confesseur. D'ailleurs, j'ai découvert un autre de ses secrets, bien que j'ignore encore qui est ce Fidélio que Denz a désigné comme héritier. »
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: « Intéressant. Je savais qu'il cachait des choses, même à moi, son ami et confesseur. D'ailleurs, j'ai découvert un autre de ses secrets, bien que j'ignore encore qui est ce Fidélio que Denz a désigné comme héritier. »

languages.text: "İlginç. Dostu ve sırdaşı olsam da benden bile gizlediği bir şeyler olduğunu biliyordum. Gerçi sizinle tanışmak, fark ettiğim tek sır değil. Denz'in kendine vâris olarak belirlediği şu Fidelio'nun kim olduğunu hâlâ bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Interesting. I knew he kept secrets even from me, his friend and confessor. Then again, meeting you is not the only secret I've discovered. I still don't know who this Fidelio is, the person who Denz made his heir."

traits.locale_text: "İlginç. Dostu ve günah çıkardığı kişi olsam da benden bile gizlediği bir şeyler olduğunu biliyordum. Gerçi sizinle tanışmak, fark ettiğim tek sır değil. Denz'in kendine vâris olarak belirlediği şu Fidelio denen adamın kim olduğunu hâlâ bilmiyorum."
